slide1.title: Welcome to Axie Battle Helper!
slide1.thisTool: This tool will help you count the cards and energies from your opponent
slide1.recommend: We recommend you to keep the app at one side of the screen, and the game on 'window mode' at the other side

slide2.title: Step 1: Identify your enemies
slide2.first: Fist, write down the Axie's IDs
slide2.tedious: It could be a little tedious, but we will save time later!

slide3.title: Step 2: Select the cards played
slide3.first: Select the cards your enemy have played. Energies and cards will decrease automatically
slide3.steal: The energies stealed have to be updated manually with the '+' y '-' buttons

slide4.title: Atention
slide4.first: When your enemy has 6 or less remaining cards, available cards will be restored. When you click them they won't get greyed out because he might have them next round

slide5.title: Atention
slide5.first: When you kill an Axie, click the 'Kill' button and the cards it didn't played will be discounted from the deck

slide6.title: Finally
slide6.first: Keep a record from your wins, draws and looses!

donations.helped: Helped you win more SLP? You can help me to keep improving this tool!
